net.cloud.client.util

Class IOUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.client.util.IOUtil

  • public class IOUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A class filled with utility methods concerning I/O classes and their usage. For example, there are methods to convert and wrap an i/o object to another type.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.io.BufferedReader SYS_IN
      A BufferedReader which will read from System.in
      static java.io.PrintWriter SYS_OUT
      A PrintWriter which will write to System.out

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      IOUtil()

      static java.io.BufferedReader streamToReader(java.io.InputStream in)
      Wraps the given stream into a buffered reader
      static java.io.PrintWriter streamToWriter(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Wraps the given stream into a PrintWriter.
      static java.io.PrintWriter writerToString(java.io.StringWriter stringWriter)
      Wraps the given StringWriter into a PrintWriter so that the Writer may be used throughout the server.

    • Method Detail

      • streamToReader

        public static java.io.BufferedReader streamToReader(java.io.InputStream in)
        Wraps the given stream into a buffered reader
        Parameters:
        in - The InputStream to convert into a BufferedReader
        Returns:
        A BufferedReader that will read from the InputStream

      • streamToWriter

        public static java.io.PrintWriter streamToWriter(java.io.OutputStream out)
        Wraps the given stream into a PrintWriter. The writer will be buffered.
        Parameters:
        out - The OutputStream to wrap into a PrintWriter
        Returns:
        A PrintWriter that when written to, will write to the OutputStream

      • writerToString

        public static java.io.PrintWriter writerToString(java.io.StringWriter stringWriter)
        Wraps the given StringWriter into a PrintWriter so that the Writer may be used throughout the server.
        Parameters:
        stringWriter - The StringWriter which will ultimately collect output
        Returns:
        A PrintWriter which will write to the StringWriter
